actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to relieve Alabama Christian College of the liability to pay certain sums owed to the United States.

summary.text: Relieves a named college in Alabama of the liability to pay to the United States and to the National Direct Student Loan Fund of the college specified sums representing inadvertent payments and student loans made under the Higher Education Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill to relieve Alabama Christian College of the liability to pay certain sums owed to the United States.
